display_long_description:
Welcome to Drone Racing! Experience the thrill of FPV aerial competition in Drone Racing, a fully immersive VR game that puts you in the cockpit of elite racing drones. Fly through amazing arenas and environments in first-person view, where every twist, dive, and turn tests your reflexes and precision.

Built for virtual reality, Drone Racing delivers intense, skill-based gameplay with tight controls and realistic flight physics. Compete in a challenging single-player campaign or race against real players in fast-paced multiplayer modes. Earn upgrades, customize your drone’s look and performance, and rise through global leaderboards.

With dynamic tracks, responsive handling, and a pulse-pounding soundtrack, Drone Racing offers an unforgettable VR experience. Master every course, dodge deadly obstacles, and prove you’re the fastest pilot in the skies.

Key Features:

Immersive VR racing with first-person drone control

Single-player campaign and real-time multiplayer

Several awesome drones to pick from

Varied tracks with environmental challenges

Global leaderboards system

Strap in and take flight—Drone Racing is the future of high-speed competition.
